review: Everything I expected plus ease of installation
author: JoG "still like books"

review: Easy to set up. Have excellent wireless thru the house including a range extender. Still, shows streamed thru this device stop, saying there's not a strong enough signal which is strange seeing as when checking signal strength thru Amazon fire stick settings it shows as excellent. We don't have any issues streaming with all other products. Just this one.
author: Jeff

review: Keeps losing network connection and I have to power cycle to get it to connect again.
author: John Shelton

review: Works great for Amazon Prime and Netflix. However, I bought it to stream HBO GO and this app is terrible -- there is a big audio delay that makes it unwatchable.
author: JB

review: I LIKE THE AMAZON FIRE STICK,BUT HAVE NOT GOT YOUTUBE LOADED YET
author: Ken Phillips

review: Not a fan of how all the same movies that are free through prime are the same that are on netflix. And the movies you have to pay to watch should definitely be the prices of the redbox and not the same price as they are to rent off the cable boxes
author: dale
